title: D701 Pro 4G DashCam
metaDesc: Rugged D701 4G Dashcam designed for logistics and heavy transport, featuring tamper-proof data security.
fullDescription: A compact sticky AI terminal with dual 1080P cameras, panoramic cabin monitoring, H.265 encoding, optional RTK positioning, DMS, and ADAS. Compliant with Chinese Ministry standards for commercial vehicle safety and management.
features: HD Video: Dual 1080P recording (optional 3x720P), H.265/H.264 encoding, IR-enhanced cabin camera
Precision Positioning: GPS/BeiDou/GLONASS multi-mode (optional RTK or dual-frequency RTK+DR)
Intelligent Safety DMS: Detects fatigue (eye-closing/yawning), smoking, calling, distraction, obstruction
Intelligent Safety ADAS: Alerts for forward collision, lane departure, pedestrian detection
Global Connectivity: 4G CAT1 (optional CAT4), OTA updates
Stable Power: 9-36V wide voltage input, short-circuit protection, <2W power consumption
Extended Functions: One-touch SOS alert, WiFi debug app, geofencing, remote configuration

parameters.label: Ports
parameters.value: 8-pin BMW Power, SOS, Nano SIM, TF Card (Max 512GB), 3x In/1x Out IO

packaging: 1x D701 Unit, 2x Keys, 1x Hardwire Kit, 1x External Cam (Optional)
